vertical.description: Is direction of the flex vertical, use flex-direction: column
vertical.description_zh: Is direction of the flex vertical, use flex-direction: column

wrap.description: Set whether the element is displayed in a single line or in multiple lines
wrap.description_zh: Set whether the element is displayed in a single line or in multiple lines

justify.description: Sets the alignment of elements in the direction of the main axis
justify.description_zh: Sets the alignment of elements in the direction of the main axis

align.description: Sets the alignment of elements in the direction of the cross axis
align.description_zh: Sets the alignment of elements in the direction of the cross axis
